metadata.description:
Owner of this NFT has the right to redeem it.
If you wish to claim it, simply burn this NFT.

Please contact us via twitter (https://twitter.com/VVSalon_NFT) for further information. 
FYI, free global shipping fee and insurance is already covered with the NFT. 


Liber Pater, a small boutique winery in the Graves appellation of Bordeaux, which began production only in 2006, has earned a cult status in very a short time, making it one of the rarest and most sought-after & one the most expensive wines of today. Owner-winemaker Loïc Pasquet uses rare varieties native to the Graves region on un-grafted rootstock, that were used to make wine in the mid 19th Century before the scourge of phylloxera was destroyed vineyards in France and most of Europe. These rare vines were chosen through ‘selection massale‘ to produce rather exceptional wines example ‘pre-phylloxera’ Bordeaux.
metadata.name: Liber Pater 2007, by Liber Pater
